wave_2_per_frame12=
wave_2_per_frame13=ground = below(t5,-.9);
wave_2_per_frame14=trig = below(int(rand(100)),1);
wave_2_per_frame15=trig = trig * bnot(ground) * bnot(bird);
wave_2_per_frame16=bird = bird * bnot(ground);
wave_2_per_frame17=
wave_2_per_frame18=bird = bnot(bird)*trig;
wave_2_per_frame19=
wave_2_per_frame20=t6 = bird;
wave_2_per_point1=
wave_2_per_point2=r = 1; g = 0; b = 0;
wave_2_per_point3=k1 = below(sample,.5);
wave_2_per_point4=
wave_2_per_point5=dx = .02*k1*sin(sample*50);

wave_2_per_point7=//clb = above(sin(time/3),0);
wave_2_per_point8=
wave_2_per_point9=f1 = sqr(dx);
wave_2_per_point10=
wave_2_per_point11=dy =  20*f1*t1 + t2/150;
wave_2_per_point12=dy = dy+ (1-k1) * .004*sin(sample*50);

wave_2_per_point14=x = dx + .5 + .1*t3;
wave_2_per_point15=
wave_2_per_point16=dy = dy + +.2*dx*t4;
wave_2_per_point17=
wave_2_per_point18=y0 = y0 + time/7;
wave_2_per_point19=y0 = y0 - int(y0) ;
wave_2_per_point20=y0 = t5;
wave_2_per_point21=y = dy+ .7 + y0/8;

shape_3_per_frame1=x = .5+.3*cos(time/59);
shape_3_per_frame2=y = .5+.3 *sin(time/59);
per_frame_1=q1=frame%40-bass*sin(time*.53);
per_frame_2=q2=frame%20-treb*sin(time*.65);
per_frame_3=q3=frame%30-mid*sin(time*.43);
per_frame_4=wave_r=.3+.4*sin(above(q1,wave_b));
per_frame_5=wave_b=.2+.7*sin(Above(q2,wave_g));
per_frame_6=wave_G=.4+.5*sin(above(q2,wave_r));
per_frame_7=wave_x=.5-.2*Sin(time*.64);
per_frame_8=wave_y=.5+.2*sin(time*.76);
per_frame_9=wave_mystery=wave_myster-.5*sin(Time*.65);
per_pixel_1=a=frame%50*.25*rad*ang*x*y;
per_pixel_2=nr=sin(x+y*ang+.8*time&bass*q3);
per_pixel_3=dx=if(Above(x,.2*a),dx,-dx)*Sin(bass_Att+Treb_Att+mid_Att)*nr;
per_pixel_4=dx=if(below(x,-.4*a),dx,-dx)*sin(bass+treb+mid)*nr;
per_pixel_5=dx=if(above(x,-.2*a),dx,-dx)*sin(mid_att)*nr;
per_pixel_6=dx=if(below(x,.4*a),dx,-dx)*sin(mid)*nr;
per_pixel_7=dy=if(above(y,.2*a),dy,-dy)*sin(bass_att)*nr;
per_pixel_8=dy=if(below(y,-.1*a),dy,-dy)*Sin(treb_att)*nr;
per_pixel_9=dy=if(above(y,.4*a),dy,-dy)*sin(treb)*nr;
per_pixel_10=dy=if(below(y,-.3*a),dx,-dy)*sin(bass)*nr;
per_pixel_11=zoom=zoom+.10*sin(rad-.2*q3/q1-.3);
warp_1=`#define MYSAMP sampler_rand00_smalltiled      //sampler_cells
warp_2=`sampler MYSAMP;
warp_3=`float4 texsize_rand00;
warp_4=`
warp_5=`shader_body
warp_6=`{
warp_7=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`
warp_10=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_11=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_12=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*1;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    // mix in img...
warp_15=`    float2 offset = float2(roam_cos.x, roam_sin.x)*0.4;
warp_16=`    float3 pic = tex2D(MYSAMP, uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_rand00.zw + offset).xyz;
warp_17=`    ret = lerp(ret, pic, 0.04);    
warp_18=`
warp_19=`    // darken over time
warp_20=`    ret *= 0.97 + 0.03*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_21=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`ret=GetBlur1(uv);
comp_5=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x+ret.x,uv.y+ret.y));
comp_6=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x-ret.y,uv.y-ret.y));
comp_7=`ret=pow(length(ret)*ret*1.33,0.89-GetBlur3(uv));
comp_8=`//ret=saturate(ret);
comp_9=`//ret*=tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv*ret.y);
comp_10=`ret*=ret.z;
comp_11=`ret=ret-GetPixel(uv);
comp_12=`}
